data.title: Nosologies/Diagnostic Systems
data.meta_description: This chapter charts the history of psychiatric classification from the mid to late eighteenth century to the present. Though madness has a long history, formal psychiatric classifications depended upon the eighteenth- and nineteenth-century rise of the asylum and the...
